backend/main.mo: Actor canister handling per-user profiles and link CRUD with access control and migration integration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration utility upgrading stored links to include new image and color fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to modified frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global dark theme styles defining OKLCH color variables and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React app and mounting it into the page.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling auth, profile setup flow, and rendering the link library UI within the themed layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Sign‑in/out control using Internet Identity with loading states and react-query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first‑time users to save their profile name with validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/common/ConfirmDi: Confirmation dialog that triggers link deletion using useDeleteLink and shows a loading state.
frontend/src/components/layout/GameMenuL: Layout wrapper that renders children over a fixed background image with an overlay.
frontend/src/components/link-library/Edi: Dialog for editing an existing link, handling URL validation, image uploads, color selection, and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/link-library/Lin: Form for creating new links with URL validation, optional image upload, and color selection using useAddLink.
Main panel that loads all links, displays loading/error states, and shows the add-link form and tile grid.
Scrollable list view of links with actions to open, edit, or delete each item using dialogs.
Grid tile component showing a link’s image or initials with hover actions to edit or delete.
Responsive grid layout that displays LinkTile components or an empty-state message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinks.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting link records through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for loading and saving the authenticated user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining the dark theme and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/linkPersonalization.t: Utility functions for link color presets, avatar initials, file-to-data-URL conversion, and tile color styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/src/utils/validateUrl.ts: Validates URL strings, enforcing protocol and domain rules and returning descriptive errors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, issues, and architectural notes for the link‑library application.
